articles.description: Shaw was dismissed in bizarre fashion en route to his knock of 34 in the match against Gloucestershire in the group-B tie in Cheltenham. | Cricket
articles.content: Snubbed by the selectors after an forgettable IPL 2023 season, for the West Indies tour and the Asian Games, Prithvi Shaw had embarked on a longer route to mark a return to the Indian side as he head… [+2073 chars]
